data.comment: The match is underway in Sangju.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 2, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
In the minute 3, Sangju Sangmu push forward at Sangju Civic Stadium and Ju-Sung Woo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Daegu defence.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Daegu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Throw-in for Daegu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Tsubasa Nishi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 9, Geun-ho Lee of Sangju Sangmu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Park Dong-jin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Daegu’s Tsubasa Nishi is on his feet again at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 11, Dong Jun Lee signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Daegu's half.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 15, Sangju Sangmu's Geun-ho Lee is on target but unsuccessful.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 18, Kim Dae-won (Daegu) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Ahn Tae-hyeon puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Moon Chang-jin to set up the goal.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Daegu's Cesinha misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 24, Dong Jun Lee awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Daegu close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Dong Jun Lee signals a throw-in for Daegu, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
Own goal! Kim Jae-woo scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
Daegu make their first substitution with Dejan Damjanovic replacing Tsubasa Nishi.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 42, Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic is whistled for offside at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Sangju Sangmu defence as Cesinha fires in a strike for Daegu.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
Daegu pushes forward through Dejan Damjanovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Cesinha for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Sangju Civic Stadium.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick Daegu.
In the minute 46, Can Daegu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Geun-ho Lee gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 48, Kim Jae-woo (Daegu) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Dong Jun Lee awards Daegu a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
The away team replace Kim Dae-won with Oh Hu-seong.
In the minute 55, Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Geun-ho Lee with Jeong Jae-Hee. This is the first substitution made today by Kim Tae-wan.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Daegu in Sangju.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 60, Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Ahn Tae-hyeon (Sangju Sangmu) has received a yellow card from Dong Jun Lee.
Park Yong-woo is on a sub for Moon Chang-jin for Sangju Sangmu.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Sangju Sangmu's Park Dong-jin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu surge into the attack at Sangju Civic Stadium but Kwon Kyung-won’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Daegu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 67, Daegu are coming forward and Ryu Jae-moon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Daegu's Cesinha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sangju Sangmu defender.
Jeong Jae-Hee of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, Daegu have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Lee Jin-hyun is replacing Shin Chang-moo for the away team.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sangju to check on Ju-Sung Woo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 70, Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) has taken off Ju-Sung Woo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Kim Jin-hyeok is the replacement.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Daegu.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick Daegu.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Daegu throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Daegu.
In the minute 80, Goal! Daegu reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Cesinha.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lee Jin-hyun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
In Sangju Daegu attack through Jeong Seung-won. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Dong Jun Lee awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
At Sangju Civic Stadium, Park Ji-min has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Daegu's Ryu Jae-moon breaks free at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 87, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Daegu are pushing forward but Cesinha's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 87, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
Jeong Seung-won (Daegu) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
At Sangju Civic Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kim Jin-hyeok for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dong Jun Lee awards Daegu a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
